item.title: Barack Obama said in a podcast interview published on Saturday that “aliens are real, but I haven’t seen them,” though he later clarified that the chances Earth has been visited by aliens are “low.” #Aliens #BarackObama #UFO #Extraterrestrial #DonaldTrump
